name: contains
description:
Returns a boolean that indicates whether a keyword substring is within another string.
Returns `null` if either parameter is null.

params.name: string
params.description: String expression: input string to check against. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: substring
params.description: String expression: A substring to find in the input string. If `null`, the function returns `null`.
